name: Kiniro no Corda 2 ff
storyline: The stage is Seisou High School, six months after the previous title. She plans to have an ensemble concert with her friends. It is necessary to enhance their playing techniques and keep good relationships with other members. Have a successful ensemble concert!
summary: Full voiced enhanced port of Kiniro no Corda 2. Included in the new content is a route for the character Fudou Shouma from the Kiniro no Corda mobile game Bannin no Kiniro no Corda, an ending for Kira Akihiko and additions to Etou Kiriya's route. There are more than 30 new events and 30 new stills added to the game.
